title: Therapy's Not Working For Me
description:
Today, we’re talking with a mom who is worried about her teen son’s obsessive relationship with his online girlfriend, a working dad who feels like he can’t get his head above water, and a guy who doesn’t think therapy is helping at all.
  My teenage son is consumed with an unhealthy online relationship
 My wife and I both work and we’re drowning under the weight of it all
 I feel like therapy’s not working for me
 Lyrics of the Day: "Locomotive" - Sick Of It All
  Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
  Support Our Sponsors:
  BetterHelp
